summary: A calendar entry for a 30-minute meeting regarding Epstein scheduled for April 25, 2019, organized by USANYS (likely USAO SDNY) and marked as personal. The entry includes an alarm reminder and is part of the Epstein case document release.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The meeting is about him, indicating he is the central topic of discussion.

events.title: Meeting regarding Epstein
events.description: A 30-minute meeting scheduled to discuss matters related to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A meeting specifically about Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for April 25, 2019, by USANYS (U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York).
The meeting was marked as 'X-PERSONAL' in the calendar entry.
The document is a calendar entry with a reminder alarm set for 15 minutes before the meeting start time.
